name: BreakIn (itch) (marco's retrobits)
description:
BreakIn 20-Liner BASIC Breakout for the Sinclair ZX Spectrum

BreakIn is a clone of the classic Breakout action game, written in 20 lines of BASIC (max 80 chars per line) for the Sinclair ZX Spectrum homecomputer. You can either download it for use with an emulator or a real ZX Spectrum or play it in your browser (powered by JSSpeccy emulator by Matt Westcott; keyboard is required).

Controls: z: left; x: right.

BreakIn is my entry to the Breakout Basic Challenge, organized by Associazione Culturale RetroProgramming Italia 8 bit e oltre in May 2019. The implementation approach has been inspired by Attribute Smash!. You can read more about BreakIn here (English language) or here (Italian language).
